channel.title: New tabs are off!
channel.description:
Not sure if this is client section or server section, sorry.
But using my so call shitty varrockscape source + client (Making a server out of it using my learned skills) I have added new tab area + maparea all by myself using my own methods ( realign sprites, etc.)
I have followed no tutorials but using my own knowledge and i knew i will need help one time, and the clicking it a bit off after i moved the logout button.
here's a video of what im talking about. [URL=http://tinypic.com/r/xknekn/6]Tabs Are off (TinyPic Video)[/URL]
when you have watch the video, it shows that if i clicked on the emotes tab, it will show the option tab, and when i clicked the music tab it will show the emotes tab. same goes prayer tab, it's a little bit off but not alot. It's only the bottom 3 sprites because those are the one i had to really realign and adjust it. any help?

item.title: New tabs are off!
item.dc:creator: @yesimanub yesimanub
item.description:
@yesimanub wrote:

sk8rdude461:

This is client sided I believe. You need to edit the positioning of the clickable section of the tabs.

that’s the problem, where is the method for clicking?

Read full topic

item.title: New tabs are off!
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

This is client sided I believe. You need to edit the positioning of the clickable section of the tabs.
